Subject: Omit errors from scan jobs
Description: On some of our scan jobs, we have messages that are always shown as ERROR, yet they are known and are not technically errors. Is there a way to either stop logging specific errors into the SA_Message table or categorize these errors as warnings? Would make it easier to see scan results. Even if there is one error, job shows as ERROR.
Solution_Comment__c:
Issue:
Scan jobs are throwing errors on file system objects that errors are expected on. Need to filter these objects to clear the errors.


Resolution:
Added exclusions to the objects that are expected to error using scoping option documentation.

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AccessAnalyzer_12.0/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/DataCollector/FSAA/ScopingOptions.htm
